channel.title: Untar on Luke Salamone's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Untar on Luke Salamone's Blog

item.title: How to Zip and Unzip a tar.gz File
item.description: If you want to extract a tar archive tar -xf archive.tar.gz If you want to compress a directory tar -czvf archive.tar.gz /path/to/directory That’s all.
